DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate PET-CT and EmII/3-10 serology as potential markers to assess the parasitocidal effect of benzimidazoles - Trial with medicinal product
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of the Potentially Parasitocidal Effect of a Long Term Chemotherapy With Benzimidazoles
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with inoperable alveolar echinococcosis With negative PETCT EmII/310 serology under longterm chemotherapy with benzimidazoles Exclusion criteria: Positive PETCT Positive EmII310 Serology No compliance Reduced life expectancy Pregnancy
